message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $13,500. I believe it offers significant value, even exceeding the asking price. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, the price you offered is quite a bit lower than I can accept. Could you meet me halfway at $11,750?
I understand your position, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
